# container

**Instance Property**

The context’s model container.

## Declaration

```swift
var container: ModelContainer { get }
```

## Discussion

The property provides a reference to the model container you specify when calling the context’s initializer. For more information, see [doc://com.apple.SwiftData/documentation/SwiftData/ModelContext/init(_:)].
title: container
